pr_title: Add example for gRPC using Maven

timeline.bodyText: keeping versions up to date maybe painful down the line, but since this is meant to be an example from the user's perspective it is representative of actual use.
timeline.author: Scottmitch

replies.bodyText: Any way we can source gradle.properties and get the version?
replies.author: NiteshKant

replies.bodyText: we maybe able to but because gradle and maven treat build dependencies differently using the version verbatim would lead to unresolved artifacts. I'll update the release script to bump this version.
replies.author: Scottmitch

timeline.message: Add example for gRPC using Maven

timeline.bodyText: Also add a server so the example is self sufficient?
timeline.author: NiteshKant

replies.bodyText: I just moved the pom.xml into the existing helloworld example to avoid duplication
replies.author: Scottmitch

timeline.message: Add example for gRPC using Maven
move maven build file into existing project, update release.sh
move maven build file into existing project, update release.sh
